dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5389 IH: Restoring the United States Department of War Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14347 (relating to restoring the United States Department of War).

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Restoring the United States Department of War Act.
Executive Order 14347 (90 Fed. Reg. 17508; relating to restoring the United States Department of War) shall have the force and effect of law.
